DeathSteel::

He nods and pulls his wings from his back. He connect the shoulder 
attachments together and forms a two handed bladed weapon. (Be aware, 
this is similar to the Klingon Batlath)  He looked directly at Kaiser 
with no fear in his optics. "You are cunning. I admire that. let the 
opponent make the first mistake. Fine, I shall undertake your 
challange."  He swished the wide blades around his body. He stopped, 
held fast, then swung up and then down, bring the blade towards 
Kaiser's shoulder. HE did not wish to disobey the words of Tyrael. He 
would not kill Kaiser. One does not make ranks by killing thier 
superior officer. Well, not right away anyway.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He nods willingly and draws his two blades.  He holds his 
two curved 
> scimitars in a crossed defensive stance in front of his face.  With 
the free 
> fingers of one hand he beckons for Deathsteel to make the first 
move.  "Come 
> on Deathsteel, let's see how you handle yourself.  Have at me!"
